TopicTitle: [1.12.5] Sterenfront - A Interstellar Planet Pack - In Development.

Articles.Content:
"Amid the stars, we stand on the brink of endless futures. It is only by stepping forward that we collapse the uncertain into reality." - Unknown Kerbal.

Embark on an extraordinary journey through space with the Sternenfront Planet Pack Mod for Kerbal Space Program.  Explore a richly detailed new star systems. From the terraformed landscapes of Mars-like planets to the lush green expanses of exoplanets, every celestial body offers new challenges and discoveries. Uncover historical landmarks and artifacts scattered across the planets, remnants of ancient civilizations and epic battles that hint at the complex alternate history. Engage in unique missions and science experiments designed to immerse you in the lore of Sternenfront, guiding you through a narrative that spans centuries of antient innovation and conflict.

Prepare for liftoff, and let the adventures of Sternenfront ignite your passion for exploration.

This is a work in Progress mod that is based on a project on DeviantArt.

This mod requires:

Kopernicus & Niako's Kopernicus Utilities
